Question.Subject: current status of the internet: connection between continents?
Question.Content: hi people, please can someone help me with information about current status of the internet: connection between continents. And also a website or websites that i can get more information about my topic. thankz
Question.ChosenAnswer:
The intercontinental Internet connections are known as the first tier of the internet. ISPs are part of the second and third tier.
For more information, wikipedia is always a great place to go. If you're not allowed to cite wikipedia just cite the articles it links to.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tier_1_network
